![Jamie Macaulay](./images/jamie.jpg) 

[Dr Jamie Macaulay](https://www.st-andrews.ac.uk/biology/people/jdjm/) 
got involved in Passive Acoustic research when he was a physics undergraduate at 
the University of St Andrews. 

He then moved over to the school of biology and 
completed his PhD on the bahaviour of harbour porpoise in tidal rapids.
